channel.title: Chicago Internet Server Halloween on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Chicago Internet Server Halloween on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Everyday is halloween.
item.description: Boy oh boy, today is halloween. I wish I was hanging with the pirates though… Well, I guess I will have to do without for today. but not this weekend mind you… I wonder if terrorists will attack today like the internet is telling us. Maybe it will be anthrax? Speaking of which, slayer is coming to chicago on thanksgiving eve.
